safetyTips: Bottled wiped with anti-bac, wrapped in protective packaging and bagged. Left on door step.
name: COCKTAIL IN A BOTTLE
description: My bar quality pre-mixed bottled cocktails are made 'fresh to order' by hand blending premium selected quality spirits (Many of which are Kentish) with natural ingredients in order to create something that is truly authentic and delicious. With over 20 vintage, classic and contemporary cocktails on my menu, I have something for everyone to get the party started! Order Online.  **Please keep empty bottles as I recycle and will collect on next order.
